timeline.message: Update jaxws.2.3.common to implement missing methods

timeline.bodyText: jaxb-3.0 is in the JEE 9 full profile right? Not web profile? You should probably add it to com.ibm.websphere.appserver.jakartaee-9.0
timeline.author: tevans78
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -22,5 +22,5 @@ Subsystem-Name: Jakarta XML Bindings 3.0
   io.openliberty.jakarta.jaxb-3.0
 -bundles=\
   io.openliberty.jaxb.3.0.internal.tools
-kind=noship
+kind=beta
 edition=base

replies.bodyText: At the moment, cdi-3.0 drags the io.openliberty.jakarta.jaxb-3.0 API feature into the web profile ... we should check if that is correct or not.
replies.author: tevans78

replies.bodyText: @tevans78 thanks for checking this! That's correct: jaxb-3.0 isn't a part of the web profile? So I've added the jaxb-3.0 to the com.ibm.websphere.appserver.jakartaee-9.0 feature as you suggested, as far as the private feature being dragged into the webProfile, that kind of matches what was done with web profile 8. Since it's a private feature that really only contains the spec API, is that necessarily a problem?
replies.author: neuwerk

replies.bodyText: I don't think it is a problem ... just worth checking because I can't remember why CDI pulls it in
replies.author: tevans78
